name: Plan U - Organic Pescatarian Muscle Builder

Breakfast.details: Organic Protein-Packed Smoothie Bowl: 1 scoop organic vanilla protein powder, 1 cup organic Greek yogurt, 1/2 organic banana, 1/2 cup organic mixed berries, 2 tbsp organic almond butter, 1/4 cup organic granola
Breakfast.instructions: Blend protein powder, yogurt, banana, and berries. Pour into a bowl and top with almond butter and granola.

Mid-Morning Snack.details: Organic Tuna Salad on Crackers: 4 oz organic canned tuna, 1 tbsp organic mayonnaise, 1 tbsp organic chopped celery, 6 organic whole grain crackers
Mid-Morning Snack.instructions: Mix tuna, mayonnaise, and celery. Serve on crackers.

Lunch.details: Organic Shrimp and Quinoa Bowl: 6 oz organic grilled shrimp, 1 cup cooked organic quinoa, 1 cup organic mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, zucchini), 2 tbsp organic lemon-herb dressing
Lunch.instructions: Grill shrimp. Saut√© vegetables. Serve over quinoa and drizzle with dressing.

Pre-Workout Snack.details: Organic Energy Bites: 1/2 cup organic rolled oats, 2 tbsp organic honey, 2 tbsp organic peanut butter, 1 scoop organic vanilla protein powder
Pre-Workout Snack.instructions: Mix all ingredients, form into bite-sized balls.

Post-Workout Snack.details: Organic Protein Shake: 1.5 scoops organic whey protein powder, 1 cup organic almond milk, 1 tbsp organic chia seeds

Dinner.details: Organic Baked Salmon with Sweet Potato and Asparagus: 8 oz organic baked salmon, 1 medium organic sweet potato, 1 cup organic steamed asparagus, 1 tbsp organic olive oil, 1 organic lemon
Dinner.instructions: Bake salmon. Roast sweet potato. Steam asparagus. Drizzle everything with olive oil and lemon juice.

Evening Snack.details: Organic Cottage Cheese with Fruit: 1 cup organic cottage cheese, 1/2 cup organic pineapple chunks, 2 tbsp organic flaxseeds
Evening Snack.instructions: Mix cottage cheese with pineapple chunks. Sprinkle with flaxseeds.
